title: Nunu in General-ish, I guess
body: I feel Nunu needs a bit more damaging abilities, for people who want to play him mid, so I propose his Q deal damage to champions based on the heal he gets from eating minions, not the 1000 true damage. This is based on me playing mid and not being able to do much but use my E to hit them and speed boost someone to attack. Thank you for taking this into consideration! I also would like for a visual update on Nunu and also Nathan, because they don't look that good in game

replies.body: Riot decides what champions they want where. Kindred/gnar wasnt made to be a adc laner just as nunu wasnt made to be a mid laner.
I know, but this just so he has the possibility of doing better in the mid lane, with tweaks. Thanks for the info!
He need to be better jungle/SUPPORT
They could also just make it like Cho'Gath's ult, but then there'd be another ult as a normal ability
